title: Splat Charger CAM-O
paragraphs: The Splat Charger CAM-O is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Barazushi-branded variant of the the Splat Charger from the Splatlands Collection and features a different sub and special weapon.
The Splat Charger CAM-O makes its first appearance in Splatoon 3 with identical stats to the Splat Charger.
- Promotional image of the Splatlands Collection - Barazushi weapons

- Load videoLocal FileLocal File might collect personal data.ContinueDismisshttps://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/File:S3_Splat_Charger_CAM-O_model_rotating.mp4


Promotional video (link to file)
- The Splat Charger CAM-O's appearance could be a reference to the Kelp Splat Charger, given the kelp stuck to the side of the ink tank.
The brand stylization suffix "CAM-O" could be interpreted as camo or camouflage.
